cities.name: Viena
cities.description: Ciudad imperial con museos y música clásica a cada paso. El Palacio de Schönbrunn y la Ringstrasse condensan el barroco y el historicismo, mientras cafés como Demel mantienen la tradición pastelera. Ideal para caminar entre parques y teatros de ópera.
cities.endescription: Imperial city with museums and classical music at every turn. The Schönbrunn Palace and the Ringstrasse embody Baroque and Historicism, while cafés like Demel uphold the pastry tradition. Ideal for walking among parks and opera houses.

cities.name: Brujas
cities.description: Centro medieval perfectamente conservado, canales bordeados de árboles y plazas adoquinadas como el Markt. Campanarios, casas gremiales y chocolaterías crean un ambiente de cuento que invita a perderse sin prisa.
cities.endescription: Perfectly preserved medieval center, tree-lined canals, and cobblestone squares like the Markt. Bell towers, guild houses, and chocolatiers create a fairytale atmosphere that invites leisurely wandering.

cities.name: Copenhague
cities.description: Equilibrio entre diseño contemporáneo y tradición nórdica. Nyhavn, Tívoli y barrios ciclistas muestran una ciudad humana y acogedora; gastronomía de vanguardia y respeto por el espacio público.
cities.endescription: Balance between contemporary design and Nordic tradition. Nyhavn, Tivoli, and bike-friendly neighborhoods showcase a human and welcoming city; avant-garde gastronomy and respect for public space.

cities.name: Liubliana
cities.description: Capital pequeña y escénica, con casco peatonal, cafés junto al río y el castillo en lo alto. Base ideal para excursiones al lago Bled y los Alpes Julianos.
cities.endescription: Small and scenic capital with a pedestrian center, riverside cafés, and a castle on the hill. Ideal base for excursions to Lake Bled and the Julian Alps.

cities.name: Barcelona
cities.description: Modernismo de Gaudí, mar y montaña en un mismo plano. La Sagrada Familia, Park Güell y la vida de barrio conviven con mercados y museos; paseos desde Montjuïc a las playas.
cities.endescription: Gaudí's modernism, sea and mountains on the same plane. The Sagrada Familia, Park Güell, and neighborhood life coexist with markets and museums; walks from Montjuïc to the beaches.

cities.name: Sevilla
cities.description: Casco histórico monumental, patios y azulejos. El Alcázar, la Catedral y el barrio de Santa Cruz se suman a una potente cultura de tapas y al flamenco.
cities.endescription: Monumental historic center, patios, and tiles. The Alcázar, the Cathedral, and the Santa Cruz neighborhood add to a strong tapas culture and flamenco.

cities.name: Tallin
cities.description: Ciudad vieja medieval amurallada, torres y tejados de colores con vistas al Báltico. Invierno frío, pero fotogénico desde Toompea.
cities.endescription: Medieval walled old town, towers, and colorful rooftops with views of the Baltic. Cold winter, but photogenic from Toompea.

cities.name: París
cities.description: Romance urbano: Sena, bulevares y museos icónicos. Barrios con identidad propia y cafés a pie de calle; Notre Dame, Sacré-Coeur y la Torre Eiffel como hitos imprescindibles.
cities.endescription: Urban romance: Seine, boulevards, and iconic museums. Neighborhoods with their own identity and street-side cafés; Notre Dame, Sacré-Coeur, and the Eiffel Tower as must-see landmarks.

cities.name: Budapest
cities.description: Arquitectura Art Nouveau, baños termales y paseos nocturnos sobre el Danubio. El Parlamento brilla al caer la tarde desde el Puente de las Cadenas.
cities.endescription: Art Nouveau architecture, thermal baths, and nighttime walks along the Danube. The Parliament shines at dusk from the Chain Bridge.

cities.name: Florencia
cities.description: Cuna del Renacimiento: Duomo, Uffizi y artesanías en el Oltrarno. Una ciudad-museo viva donde cada calle guarda esculturas, palacios y talleres.
cities.endescription: Cradle of the Renaissance: Duomo, Uffizi, and crafts in the Oltrarno. A living museum-city where every street holds sculptures, palaces, and workshops.

cities.name: Roma
cities.description: La “Ciudad Eterna” combina ruinas clásicas, plazas barrocas y vida de barrio. Del Panteón a la Fontana di Trevi, la historia convive con trattorias y terrazas.
cities.endescription: The “Eternal City” combines classical ruins, baroque squares, and neighborhood life. From the Pantheon to the Trevi Fountain, history coexists with trattorias and terraces.

cities.name: Venecia
cities.description: Sin coches y con un trazado acuático único. Canales, palacios y puentes conectan islas; desde San Marcos a los barrios más tranquilos, es pura contemplación.
cities.endescription: Car-free with a unique aquatic layout. Canals, palaces, and bridges connect islands; from St. Mark's to the quieter neighborhoods, it's pure contemplation.

cities.name: La Valeta
cities.description: Fortificada y barroca, con miradores al Gran Puerto. Palacios, iglesias y museos concentrados en un casco compacto y caminable.
cities.endescription: Fortified and baroque, with views of the Grand Harbour. Palaces, churches, and museums concentrated in a compact, walkable old town.

cities.name: Bergen
cities.description: Casas de madera en Bryggen, puerto vivo y montañas que caen a fiordos. Punto de partida perfecto para rutas escénicas.
cities.endescription: Wooden houses in Bryggen, lively port, and mountains descending into fjords. Perfect starting point for scenic routes.

cities.name: Ámsterdam
cities.description: Canales Patrimonio de la UNESCO, gables estrechos y cultura ciclista. Museos de primer nivel y barrios verdes conectados por puentes.
cities.endescription: UNESCO canals, narrow gables, and cycling culture. Top-tier museums and green neighborhoods connected by bridges.

cities.name: Oporto
cities.description: Azulejos, puentes sobre el Duero y bodegas de vino de Oporto. Librería Lello y piscinas de Leça como iconos contemporáneos.
cities.endescription: Tiles, bridges over the Douro, and Port wine cellars. Lello Bookstore and Leça pools as contemporary icons.

cities.name: Londres
cities.description: Historia y vanguardia a orillas del Támesis. Museos gratuitos, parques inmensos y una escena cultural y gastronómica inagotable.
cities.endescription: History and avant-garde on the banks of the Thames. Free museums, immense parks, and an inexhaustible cultural and gastronomic scene.

cities.name: Edimburgo
cities.description: Royal Mile, castillo y colinas verdes. La roca volcánica de Arthur’s Seat regala una panorámica excepcional sobre la ciudad de piedra.
cities.endescription: Royal Mile, castle, and green hills. The volcanic rock of Arthur’s Seat offers an exceptional panorama over the stone city.

cities.name: Praga
cities.description: Cúpulas y torres góticas sobre un casco antiguo fotogénico. Puente de Carlos al amanecer y cafés históricos con música y literatura.
cities.endescription: Gothic domes and towers over a photogenic old town. Charles Bridge at dawn and historic cafés with music and literature.

cities.name: Lucerna
cities.description: Lago, montes cercanos y el Kapellbrücke como postal. Tejados medievales y aire alpino a pocos minutos de rutas de montaña.
cities.endescription: Lake, nearby mountains, and the Kapellbrücke as a postcard. Medieval rooftops and alpine air just minutes from mountain trails.

cities.name: Zúrich
cities.description: Casco antiguo elegante junto al lago, museos, galerías y vida junto al agua. Veranos vibrantes y eficiencia suiza en cada detalle.
cities.endescription: Elegant old town by the lake, museums, galleries, and life by the water. Vibrant summers and Swiss efficiency in every detail.

cities.name: Reikiavik
cities.description: Arquitectura moderna como Harpa y Hallgrímskirkja entre paisajes volcánicos. Base para auroras y baños termales cercanos.
cities.endescription: Modern architecture like Harpa and Hallgrímskirkja among volcanic landscapes. Base for auroras and nearby thermal baths.

cities.name: Beijing
cities.description: Capital imperial con la Ciudad Prohibida, hutongs y avenidas amplias. Puerta a tramos cercanos de la Gran Muralla y a una cocina regional riquísima.
cities.endescription: Imperial capital with the Forbidden City, hutongs, and wide avenues. Gateway to nearby sections of the Great Wall and a rich regional cuisine.

cities.name: Hong Kong
cities.description: Horizonte denso en torno a un puerto lleno de ferris. Montañas, islas y reservas naturales a minutos del centro financiero.
cities.endescription: Dense skyline around a ferry-filled harbor. Mountains, islands, and nature reserves minutes from the financial center.

cities.name: Seúl
cities.description: Rascacielos y palacios, mercados nocturnos y una red de metro impecable. Distritos como Bukchon y Myeongdong muestran tradición y moda.
cities.endescription: Skyscrapers and palaces, night markets, and an impeccable subway network. Districts like Bukchon and Myeongdong showcase tradition and fashion.

cities.name: Jaipur
cities.description: La “Ciudad Rosa”: Hawa Mahal, fuertes y bazares color salmón. Artesanías, joyería y gastronomía del Rajastán en palacios y calles.
cities.endescription: The “Pink City”: Hawa Mahal, forts, and salmon-colored bazaars. Handicrafts, jewelry, and Rajasthani cuisine in palaces and streets.

cities.name: Kioto
cities.description: Templos, santuarios y jardines clásicos. Hanami en primavera, rutas arboladas y posibilidad de cruzarse con geishas en Gion.
cities.endescription: Temples, shrines, and classic gardens. Hanami in spring, tree-lined routes, and the possibility of encountering geishas in Gion.

cities.name: Luang Prabang
cities.description: Patrimonio UNESCO junto a la confluencia de ríos. Procesiones de monjes al amanecer, cascadas cercanas y arquitectura colonial-budista.
cities.endescription: UNESCO World Heritage site at the confluence of rivers. Monk processions at dawn, nearby waterfalls, and colonial-Buddhist architecture.

cities.name: Beirut
cities.description: Playas, clubes y azoteas frente a mezquitas y zocos históricos. Gastronomía y vida nocturna con aire mediterráneo y levantino.
cities.endescription: Beaches, clubs, and rooftops facing historic mosques and souks. Gastronomy and nightlife with a Mediterranean and Levantine vibe.

cities.name: Mascate
cities.description: Bahías y montañas enmarcando mezquitas, zocos y fuertes portugueses. Paseos costeros y arquitectura blanca junto al Golfo de Omán.
cities.endescription: Bays and mountains framing mosques, souks, and Portuguese forts. Coastal walks and white architecture along the Gulf of Oman.

cities.name: Doha
cities.description: Corniche con skyline futurista, Souq Waqif y el Museo de Arte Islámico de I. M. Pei. Mezcla de tradición y nuevas áreas culturales.
cities.endescription: Corniche with a futuristic skyline, Souq Waqif, and the Museum of Islamic Art by I. M. Pei. A mix of tradition and new cultural areas.

cities.name: Chiang Mai
cities.description: Templos en la ladera, cafés y mercados creativos. Punto de partida para naturaleza del norte y experiencias culinarias intensas.
cities.endescription: Temples on the hillside, creative cafes and markets. Starting point for northern nature and intense culinary experiences.

cities.name: Hanoi
cities.description: Lagos, templos y barrio francés con aire romántico. Calles angostas con cafés tradicionales y mercados vibrantes.
cities.endescription: Lakes, temples, and a French quarter with a romantic atmosphere. Narrow streets with traditional cafes and vibrant markets.

cities.name: Singapur
cities.description: Ciudad-jardín con selva urbana, Jardín Botánico y Gardens by the Bay. Templos, casas patrimoniales y una logística impecable para moverse.
cities.endescription: Garden city with urban jungle, Botanic Gardens, and Gardens by the Bay. Temples, heritage houses, and impeccable logistics for getting around.

cities.name: Chefchaouen
cities.description: Medina azul entre montañas del Rif. Callejuelas pintadas, puertas artesanales y miradores cercanos para ver el conjunto desde arriba.
cities.endescription: Blue medina among the Rif mountains. Painted alleys, artisanal doors, and nearby viewpoints to see the whole from above.

cities.name: Ciudad del Cabo
cities.description: Table Mountain, playas con pingüinos y barrios coloridos como Bo-Kaap. Jardines, viñedos cercanos y rutas panorámicas costeras.
cities.endescription: Table Mountain, beaches with penguins, and colorful neighborhoods like Bo-Kaap. Gardens, nearby vineyards, and scenic coastal routes.

cities.name: Sídney
cities.description: Ópera icónica, bahía navegable y playas urbanas como Bondi. Ferris cotidianos y parques frente al agua.
cities.endescription: Iconic opera house, navigable bay, and urban beaches like Bondi. Daily ferries and waterfront parks.

cities.name: Queenstown
cities.description: Capital de la adrenalina entre lago y montañas. Miradores naturales, aventuras y paisajes cinematográficos.
cities.endescription: Adrenaline capital between lake and mountains. Natural viewpoints, adventures, and cinematic landscapes.

cities.name: Ciudad de Quebec
cities.description: Casco amurallado en altura con vistas al San Lorenzo. Ambiente europeo, tejados empinados y puestas de sol rosadas.
cities.endescription: Walled old town with views of the St. Lawrence River. European atmosphere, steep roofs, and pink sunsets.

cities.name: La Habana
cities.description: Arquitectura colonial de tonos pastel, música en cada esquina y paseos marítimos. La Habana Vieja y el Malecón marcan el ritmo.
cities.endescription: Pastel-toned colonial architecture, music on every corner, and seaside promenades. Old Havana and the Malecón set the rhythm.

cities.name: Nueva York
cities.description: Arquitectura icónica, parques como Central Park y una escena artística incomparable. Energía urbana que no se apaga.
cities.endescription: Iconic architecture, parks like Central Park, and an unparalleled art scene. Urban energy that never fades.

cities.name: San Francisco
cities.description: Puente Golden Gate, colinas y casas victorianas. Museos de talla mundial y barrios con carácter propio.
cities.endescription: Golden Gate Bridge, hills, and Victorian houses. World-class museums and neighborhoods with their own character.

cities.name: San Miguel de Allende
cities.description: Centro colonial con parroquia neogótica rosada. Calles adoquinadas, patios y arte en galerías y talleres.
cities.endescription: Colonial center with a pink neo-Gothic parish. Cobblestone streets, patios, and art in galleries and workshops.

cities.name: Buenos Aires
cities.description: Barrios con identidad (Recoleta, San Telmo, La Boca), arquitectura variada y vida cultural intensa. Tango, parrillas y librerías en edificios emblemáticos.
cities.endescription: Neighborhoods with identity (Recoleta, San Telmo, La Boca), varied architecture, and intense cultural life. Tango, grills, and bookstores in emblematic buildings.

cities.name: Río de Janeiro
cities.description: Playas míticas, selva urbana y el Cristo Redentor vigilando bahías y morros. Ritmo de samba en calles y plazas.
cities.endescription: Iconic beaches, urban jungle, and the Christ the Redeemer statue watching over bays and hills. Samba rhythm in streets and squares.

cities.name: Cartagena
cities.description: Murallas, plazas y casonas coloniales cubiertas de buganvillas. Getsemaní y Bocagrande muestran sus caras creativa y moderna.
cities.endescription: Walls, squares, and colonial mansions covered in bougainvillea. Getsemaní and Bocagrande showcase their creative and modern sides.

cities.name: Quito
cities.description: Casco histórico dorado bajo volcanes andinos. Vistas desde la Basílica del Voto Nacional y mercados tradicionales.
cities.endescription: Golden historic center under Andean volcanoes. Views from the Basilica of the National Vow and traditional markets.

cities.name: Cuzco
cities.description: Antigua capital inca con plazas, conventos y calles empedradas. Punto de partida a Machu Picchu y miradores como el Cristo Blanco.
cities.endescription: Ancient Inca capital with plazas, convents, and cobblestone streets. Starting point to Machu Picchu and viewpoints like the White Christ.
